backend/main.mo: Implements access-controlled user profiles and a full expense CRUD system with daily total calculation using Map storage and time utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries for key frontend files covering pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point linking the main script and favicon with a root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in ThemeProvider and renders AppLayout with the DailyExpensesPage and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Empty placeholder component for authentication gating logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Empty placeholder for the Internet Identity login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty placeholder for the user profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/expenses/Expense: Displays and allows inline editing or deleting of an expense with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides header, footer, and layout structure with branding and themed styling.
frontend/src/features/expenses/date.ts: Utility functions for converting between JS dates and backend nanosecond timestamps and comparing days.
frontend/src/features/expenses/queryKeys: Defines centralized React Query keys for expenses and totals including the all-years total.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useAllYea: React Query hook that fetches the multi-year total using the anonymous actor with readiness gating.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useCreate: Mutation hook creating expenses and invalidating day, MTD, YTD, and all-years totals.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useDailyT: Fetches a day's total expenses using an anonymous actor and react-query.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useDelete: Creates a mutation to delete an expense and invalidates related totals and daily data.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useExpens: Loads all expenses for a specific day by filtering the actor's full expense list.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useMonthl: Fetches the month-to-date expense total using an anonymous actor.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useUpdate: Updates an expense and invalidates daily, monthly, yearly, and all‑years totals.
frontend/src/features/expenses/useYearly: Fetches the year-to-date expense total using an anonymous actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Provides a long-lived anonymous actor instance via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the app with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DailyExpensesPage.tsx: Page for viewing and adding daily expenses with totals and date selection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, sizing, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an expense tracker’s multi-year total feature, its state, requirements, and pending feature requests.
